CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: （表示迟疑或两个可能性之间的选择）是否；（表示两种情况都真实）是…还是…；或者…或者…；不管…还是…；或者；不管；无论
（在…之中）哪一个；（两个中的）任何一个

word_mean_info__list.difference: 作“是否”解时，多用于口语，引出宾语从句，不能直接跟or not连用。
多用于书面语中，可与or或or not连用，除引出宾语从句外，还可引出主语从句、表语从句、同位语从句或与不定式连用。

word_group.brief_definition: (面对恶劣或不幸情况)不知所措, 哭笑不得
word_group.phrase: not know whether to laugh or cry

word_group.brief_definition: (激动得)不知如何是好, 不知所措
word_group.phrase: not know whether you're coming or going

bilingual.source: Try to find out whether she feels lonely.
bilingual.target: 试着找出她是否感到孤独。

bilingual.source: I wonder whether June is a good time.
bilingual.target: 我想知道六月是否是个好时候。

bilingual.source: Find out whether there is any other information.
He asks whether we will go fishing on Sunday.
bilingual.target: 他问我们周日是否会去钓鱼。

bilingual.source: Bill wonders whether they'll have zongzi again next year.
bilingual.target: 比尔想知道明年是否还会有粽子。

bilingual.source: I'd like to know whether he has received higher education.
bilingual.target: 我想知道他是否接受了高等教育。

bilingual.source: Unusual animal behaviour, for example, can indicate whether it's cold.
bilingual.target: 例如，不寻常的动物行为可以表明天气是否寒冷。

bilingual.source: Tom wants to know whether he needs to come early tomorrow.
bilingual.target: 汤姆想知道明天他是否需要早来。

bilingual.source: I want to know whether I might have your email address.
bilingual.target: 我想知道我是否可以有你的邮箱地址。

bilingual.source: I wonder whether June is a good time to visit Hong Kong.
bilingual.target: 我想知道六月是否是访问香港的好时机。

list.abstract: 对于某件事情的不确定性，表示的怀疑。

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps we should consider whether our endeavor is worth completing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许我们该考虑下是否值得了。

yingyinNormal.en: It doesn't matter whether he was unconscious or not, whether he lives or dies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不论他是否意识清醒，不论他是死是活。

yingyinNormal.en: But whether or not he took this, he certainly took the knife.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但无论他是否拿了这个，刀肯定是他拿的。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, don't do that again. So, you want to know whether...
yingyinNormal.zh: 够了，不许再学羊叫了。那，你们俩想知道是否...

yingyinNormal.en: If you're asking whether we're suing both of your firms, the answer is yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你是问，我们是否要同时起诉两家律所，答案是「没错」。

yingyinNormal.en: But whether that's the truth or not, this is an imminent threat which we must deal with immediately.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但无论事实是否如此，解决这个威胁迫在眉睫。

yingyinNormal.en: Have a seat. I won't be long. Well, then, stand like a man who doesn't know whether to sit or not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请坐。我不久留。那就站着吧像个不知是否该坐下的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Whether he means them doesn't matter. The fact that he says them shows respect for our laws.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是否真心无所谓。但如果他说了，就表明他尊重我们的法律。

yingyinNormal.en: We're going to split into teams and discover whether or not new technology has made us better people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们分成小组，然后开始探讨新科技是否让我们变成了更优秀的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Whether we like it or not, in the past 20 years, Internet has launched a huge impact to the human lives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无论你是否喜欢，过去20年，互联网对人类社会产生了巨大的影响。

yingyinNormal.en: Black holes were predicted by Einstein's equations but physicists questioned whether they could really exist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 黑洞理论由爱因斯坦的方程式预言，但物理学家质疑它们是否真的存在。

yingyinNormal.en: Whether or not we get out of them and continue forward or spiral downward depends on whether or not we're willing to face the failure objectively, and make the right decisions to turn the loop upward again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们能否脱身继续前进还是一败涂地基于我们是否愿意客观地看待失败，做出正确决定扭转局面。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, just centipedes and spiders, lovely. There is something that jumps. I am not entirely sure whether I would prefer just like a prawn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，蜈蚣和蜘蛛，好吃，这有活蹦乱跳之物。我不是完全确定，我是否喜欢对虾。

yingyinNormal.en: And you're here to help. Not quite. We're here to analyze the situation and ask whether our society is shifting fundamentally.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你们是来帮忙的。不尽然，我们是来分析现状的，以此判定我们的社会是否在发生根本改变。

yingyinNormal.en: All his rich mates, they get to live. And anyone he thinks is worth saving, he's keeping them safe. Whether they agree with him or not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他所有富有的合作伙伴都能生存下来。然后他觉得谁有利用价值，他就会保他们平安。不管他们是否认同他。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you want to see whether you're genetically compatible with your girlfriend? Sure. DNA sequencing on your iPhone? There's an app for that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想不想知道你跟女友的基因是否兼容？当然。要不要在你的iPhone上基因测序？有这么一个应用。

yingyinNormal.en: We may never be able to determine how language came about, or whether all human languages did in fact have a common ancestor scattered through the babel of migration.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们也许永远不会知道语言从何而来，也不知道人类语言是否真有共同的原始母语并通过移民们散落于各处。

yingyinNormal.en: An operation is currently underway to recover Margot Kim's Toyota Camry. But at this moment, we still don't know whether the Evercreek High sophomore is actually inside the vehicle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正在进行玛戈·金驾驶的丰田凯美瑞打捞工作。但目前，仍不清楚是否这位埃弗克里克高二学生在车中。

yingyinNormal.en: Now you must decide for yourself how you will evolve. Forget about where these principles came from. Just assess whether or not they are useful to you, and evolve them to suit your own needs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在你必须自己决定如何发展。忘记这些法则从何而来。仅仅评估它们对你是否有用，发展它们满足自己的需求。

yingyinNormal.en: We know that in today's economy whether you go to a four-year college, a community college or a professional training program, some higher education is the surest ticket to the middle class.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都知道，在当今的经济环境中，你是否上过完整的大学、社区学院或参加过职业培训直接关系到你能否跻身中产阶级。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: if it is or was true that

examination_example.sentence: How do you decide <highlight>whether</highlight> it's worth speaking up?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你如何决定它是否值得说出来？

examination_example.sentence: Another nationwide concern is <highlight>whether</highlight> public funds from other agencies are going into construction in fire-prone districts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个全国性的担忧是，来自其他机构的公共资金是否会用于火灾易发地区的建设。

examination_example.sentence: Further trade deals raise questions about <highlight>whether</highlight> new shocks could hit manufacturing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 进一步的贸易协定引发了问题——新的冲击是否会重创制造业。

sense_info_list.en: if it is or was better

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Whether</highlight> you're a politician or a parent, it might be helpful to keep in mind that trying to maintain eye contact may backfire.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论你是政治家还是家长，牢记保持眼神交流可能会适得其反，这可能对你有帮助。

examination_example.sentence: The growth of a class of professional actors was threatening to make the drama popular, <highlight>whether</highlight> it should be new or old.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 职业演员阶层的崛起预示着戏剧将要变得大众化，不管它是新式戏剧还是旧式戏剧。

examination_example.sentence: There's always a constant fear of falling behind everyone else, <highlight>whether</highlight> that be toward graduate school, medical school or a lucrative career.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们总是害怕落后于其他人，无论是在考研、考医学院还是竞争高薪职业方面均是如此。

word_usage.usage:
whether用作连词，可引导名词从句或动词不定式短语，意思是“是否；是不是”。例：
I'll see whether she's at home.
我来看看她在不在家。

whether还可引导让步状语从句，意思是“不管；无论”。例：
Whether or not we're successful, we can be sure that we did our best.
不管成功与否，我们确已尽了最大努力。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: if it is or was true that

examination_example.sentence: They were asked to predict <highlight>whether</highlight> they'd enjoy the commute more if they conversed with other people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们被要求预测，如果他们与他人交谈，是否会更享受通勤。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Whether</highlight> the benefits of social media outweigh the drawbacks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社交媒体的优点是否大于缺点。

examination_example.sentence: Flack said it was too early to know <highlight>whether</highlight> the benefits of plentiful food outweighed the risks of feeding on landfills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Flack 说知道丰富食物的好处是否超过在垃圾填埋场进食的风险现在还为时过早。

sense_info_list.en: if it is or was better

examination_example.sentence: And this often leads to a great deal of mutual respect, <highlight>whether</highlight> it's with a colleague, an assistant or even a receptionist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论是与同事、助理，甚至是接待员，这通常都会带来极大的相互尊重。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Whether</highlight> policymakers and politicians admit it or not, workers have made clear their feelings about their economic insecurity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管政策制定者和政客是否承认，工人们已经清楚地表达了他们对经济不安全的感受。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Whether</highlight> the labels say 'non-GMO (非转基因的)' or 'no sugar', or 'zero carbohydrates', consumers are increasingly demanding more information about what's in their food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管标签上写的是“非转基因”、“无糖”还是“零碳水化合物”，消费者越来越多地要求获得更多关于食物中含有什么的信息。

word_usage.usage:
whether与if的用法区别：
(1) whether or not词组，只能用whether。
(2) 介词后头，用whether。
示例：This depends upon whether we are determined to do it.
这取决于我们是否有决心去做。
(3) 动词不定式前面，用whether。
示例：He doesn't know whether to go or stay.
他不知道是走还是留。
(4) 引导主语从句时，用whether。
Whether he will come is unknown.
他是否来还不知道。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: if it is or was true that

examination_example.sentence: There's widespread disagreement over <highlight>whether</highlight> breakfast should keep its top spot in the hierarchy (等级) of meals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，对于早餐是否应该在一日三餐的排序中高居头把交椅，是普遍存在分歧的。

examination_example.sentence: The difference lies in <highlight>whether</highlight> the project is in a sense defined and developed by the student or <highlight>whether</highlight> it's assigned by a teacher.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 区别在于项目是否某种意义上由学生制定、开发，或者说项目是否由老师布置。

examination_example.sentence: "I can not control <highlight>whether</highlight> or not I wind up getting the disease swine flu, for example, " he says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说：“例如，我无法控制自己最终是否会患上猪流感。”

sense_info_list.en: if it is or was better

examination_example.sentence: And don't worry—<highlight>whether</highlight> it's a plastic bento box or a cloth bag, lunch containers can still easily be covered with popular culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要担心——无论是塑料便当盒还是布袋，午餐盒仍然可以很容易与流行文化相呼应。

examination_example.sentence: Dating back to 1880, the most common living arrangement among young adults has been living with a romantic partner, <highlight>whether</highlight> a spouse or a significant other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时间回溯到1880年，年轻人最常见的生活安排是与爱侣生活在一起，无论是配偶还是重要的另一半。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>whether</highlight> it's an English-cooked breakfast or a coffee and a sandwich, one thing has remained the same: the prices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但无论是英式早餐还是咖啡配三明治，有一点是不会变的：价格。

word_usage.usage:
whether与if的用法区别：
(1) whether or not词组，只能用whether。
(2) 介词后头，用whether。
示例：This depends upon whether we are determined to do it.
这取决于我们是否有决心去做。
(3) 动词不定式前面，用whether。
示例：He doesn't know whether to go or stay.
他不知道是走还是留。
(4) 引导主语从句时，用whether。
Whether he will come is unknown.
他是否来还不知道。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: if it is or was true that

examination_example.sentence: That way, cattlemen will know <highlight>whether</highlight> they need to move their cattle to another field for nutrition purposes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样，养牛人就知道他们是否需要为了营养而把他们的牛转移到另一个田地。

examination_example.sentence: Thus, the keyboard can determine people's identities, and by extension, <highlight>whether</highlight> they should be given access to the computer it's connected to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，该智能键盘可以确定人们的身份，来进一步决定是否允许他们访问其所连接的计算机。

examination_example.sentence: Experts say the way you design your home could play a role in <highlight>whether</highlight> you pack on the pounds or keep them off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 专家表示，你设计房子的方式可能会对你是否会发胖产生影响。

sense_info_list.en: if it is or was better

examination_example.sentence: We all need to get involved in saving energy <highlight>whether</highlight> it's at work, at home, or at school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论是在工作中，在家里，还是在学校，我们都需要参与到节能中来。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Whether</highlight> you're looking at wallpaper or paint, the time, effort and relative expense put into it are significant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管你是在看墙纸还是油漆，花在上面的时间、精力和相关费用都是很重要的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: if it is or was true that

examination_example.sentence: This step reminds you to decide <highlight>whether</highlight> a word is important enough for you to learn now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一步提醒你去决定一个单词是否重要到需要现在就学。

examination_example.sentence: One day, a film director came to him and asked <highlight>whether</highlight> he wanted to act in his movie.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一天，一个电影导演来找他，问他是否想要出演他的电影。

examination_example.sentence: Another system can detect <highlight>whether</highlight> someone is wearing eyeglasses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个系统可以检测是否有人戴眼镜。

sense_info_list.en: if it is or was better

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Whether</highlight> I remind you or not, you're supposed to take your own work seriously.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论我是否提醒你，你都应该认真对待自己的工作。

examination_example.sentence: It is important to have a friend to talk to, <highlight>whether</highlight>（不论） it is about a sad or happy subject．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论是关于悲伤还是快乐的话题，有一个可以交谈的朋友是很重要的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Whether</highlight> a celebrity is a role model or not, he should care about his behavior.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管名人是不是榜样，他都应该关心自己的行为。

word_usage.usage:
whether与if的用法区别：
(1) whether or not词组，只能用whether。
(2) 介词后头，用whether。
示例：This depends upon whether we are determined to do it.
这取决于我们是否有决心去做。
(3) 动词不定式前面，用whether。
示例：He doesn't know whether to go or stay.
他不知道是走还是留。
(4) 引导主语从句时，用whether。
Whether he will come is unknown.
他是否来还不知道。
